channel.title: In-game Tutorial when players log in
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering about how I could make an in-game tutorial. By this I mean how can I make an NPC say something to a player as soon as they log in? eg. Forced chat and forced movements [Chat box not above NPC's heads]
I would like to have an NPC talk and when they click continue it teleports them somewhere else and so on until the tutorial is done.
I am using PI and tell me if you dont understand what I am trying to ask and I will try to explain differently.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: In-game Tutorial when players log in
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Just have dialog initiate upon login, then create your dialog and make the npc teleport the player around, create a walking check to, and if they try return it stating they’re not allowed to.

Read full topic
item.source: In-game Tutorial when players log in
